Name: Skeleton vs zombies
About the game: This is a game where you shoot Zombies, in 2D, as a skeleton, in this platform shooter game. This is the first game I'm ever publishing so the plot is very light, An evil mage has started the zombie invasion, and it's going well until they attack the 'Destroyed Town' where a skeleton with a pistol is gonna save the world.
